items.sentence: Tom and Mary said they\'d be back on October 20th.
You ought to let Tom know that you can\'t do that.
You\'re the only one who seems to know what to do.
I haven\'t been to Australia as many times as Tom.
Do you really think Tom likes the gift I gave him?
Do you really want to make your boyfriend jealous?
Do you really want to put your money in that bank?
You know that Tom is in love with you, don\'t you?
We didn\'t think about that until it was too late.
I\'ll be back in Australia the day after tomorrow.
I\'ve been waiting for the right time to tell you.
I\'ve got some ideas on how to solve this problem.
Snow has been falling steadily since this morning.
Tom wants a computer small enough to easily carry.
Tom wants to practice French with native speakers.
The officer asked to see Tom\'s driver\'s license.
I think Tom would like to know what you\'re doing.
I heard some reggae music playing in the distance.
Tom seems to be unwilling to correct his mistakes.
Tom seems to be unwilling to testify against Mary.
